title: Functional properties of starch cultivars of two Andean grains grown in Bolivia: Amaranth (Amaranthus caudatus) and canihua (Chenopodium pallidicaule)
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15
